description: The initiative, Madland, aims to create a vibrant gathering point for diverse actors within the food system, fostering collaboration and communication across various sectors. By engaging food citizens, professionals, and organizations, it seeks to promote awareness and responsibility regarding food choices and sustainability. Through events, workshops, and digital platforms, the initiative encourages knowledge sharing and showcases innovative practices. It emphasizes the importance of holistic approaches to food policy, aiming to bridge gaps between rural and urban communities while highlighting the contributions of smaller, often overlooked players in the food landscape.
name: Madland
